channel.title: Redecentralize
channel.itunes:subtitle: Quietly, some geeks are decentralizing the net. Again.
channel.itunes:author: Francis Irving
channel.itunes:summary: Quietly, some geeks are decentralizing the net. Again. Who are they? Why are they doing it? What new technologies are they using? How will this change the world? Each month, we interview one for 15 minutes.
channel.description: Quietly, some geeks are decentralizing the net. Again. Who are they? Why are they doing it? What new technologies are they using? How will this change the world? Each month, we interview one for 15 minutes.

item.title: Interview #2: Adam Ierymenko - ZeroTier One
item.itunes:author: Ira Bolychevsky
item.itunes:summary: Adam Ierymenko talks about ZeroTier One which creates flat, virtual Ethernet networks of almost unlimited size

item.title: Interview #1: Nicholas Tollervey - Drogulus
item.itunes:author: Francis Irving
item.itunes:summary: Nicholas Tollervey talks about drogulus, a programmable peer-to-peer data store designed for simplicity, security, openness and fun

item.title: Just testing
item.itunes:author: Francis Irving
item.itunes:summary: I briefly introduce the podcast, and use it to check everything works.
